Post.title: Spring Bootaccess log
Post._content:
> Spring BootlogbackTomcat Access Log

# 

Spring boottomcat`server.tomcat.accesslog`tomcat access

:

```
server.tomcat.accesslog.buffered=true # true
server.tomcat.accesslog.directory=logs # tomcat 
server.tomcat.accesslog.enabled=false # 
server.tomcat.accesslog.file-date-format=.yyyy-MM-dd #  
server.tomcat.accesslog.pattern=common #  
server.tomcat.accesslog.prefix=access_log # 
server.tomcat.accesslog.rename-on-rotate=false #  
server.tomcat.accesslog.request-attributes-enabled=false # IP 
server.tomcat.accesslog.rotate=true # 
server.tomcat.accesslog.suffix=.log # 
```

## pattern

- `%a` - ipipnginx 

- `%A` - ip

- `%b` - HTTP' - '

- `%B` - HTTP

- `%h` - IPenableLookupsfalse

- `%H` - 

- `%l` - Remote logical username from identd (always returns '-')

- `%m` - GETPOST)

- `%p` - 

- `%q` - '?'

- `%r` - HTTPURI

- `%s` - HTTP200,404

- `%S` - User session ID

- `%t` - Common Log Format

- `%u` - 

- `%U` - Requested URL path

- `%v` - Local server name

- `%D` - Time taken to process the request, in millis

- `%T` - Time taken to process the request, in seconds

- `%I` - log

Access log cookieheadersessionServletRequestApache{xxx}

- `%{xxx}i`  for incoming headersrequest header
- `%{xxx}o`  for outgoing response headersresponse header
- `%{xxx}c`  for a specific cookie
- `%{xxx}r`  xxx is an attribute in the ServletRequest
- `%{xxx}s`  xxx is an attribute in the HttpSession
- `%{xxx}t`  xxx is an enhanced SimpleDateFormat pattern (see Configuration Reference document for details on supported time patterns)

# 

`server.tomcat.accesslog.pattern`commoncombined

- `common`: `%h %l %u %t "%r" %s %b`

- `combined`: `%h %l %u %t "%r" %s %b "%{Referer}i" "%{User-Agent}i"`


[Tomcat access log](http://www.cnblogs.com/chrischennx)

```

## CentOS

```
yum install docker
```

docker

```
docker version
```

# Docker

- [Docker](https://hub.docker.com) 
- [](https://c.163yun.com) 

# Spring Boot+Docker

## Spring InitializrSpring Boot

```
@SpringBootApplication
@RestController
public class DockerApplication {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        SpringApplication.run(DockerApplication.class, args);
    }

    @RequestMapping("/")
    public String home() {
        return "Hello Spring Boot, Docker and CloudComb!";
    }
}
```

## jar

```
mvn clean package
```

![](http://www.wailian.work/images/2018/04/13/dabao.png)

```
java -jar docker-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
```

`http://127.0.0.1:8080`

# 

## Dockerfile

`Dockerfile`

```
FROM hub.c.163.com/bingohuang/jdk8:latest

MAINTAINER wangweiye wwyknight@163.com

COPY target/docker-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar app.jar

ENTRYPOINT ["java","-jar","/app.jar"]
```

Dockerfile`java -jar /app.jar`

## docker

```
docker build -t spring-boot:latest .
```

`-t`docker

[docker build](https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/commandline/build/)

## docker

```
docker run -d -p 9999:8080 spring-boot
```

`-d` Run container in background and print container ID(ID)

`-p` 

[docker run](https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/commandline/run/)

## 

`http://127.0.0.1:8080`

## 

,[](https://www.163yun.com/?h=fc)



```
docker login hub.c.163.com
Username: wwyknight@163.com
Password:
Login Succeeded
```

[](https://www.163yun.com/help/documents/15587826830438400)

```
docker tag {ID} hub.c.163.com/{}/{}
```

`hub.c.163.com/{}/{}`
Attention:  



```
docker push hub.c.163.com/{}/{}
```

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
![pic](http://s1.wailian.download/2018/01/18/2850153e0f1cdea447791b1b3d0211ec7692fae81faba-YHBVwv_fw658.jpg)
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post._content:
# 



# 

```
# /bin/bash
DB_NAME="exchange"
DB_USER="root"
DB_PASSWORD="abc123"
BIN_DIR="/usr/bin"
BACK_DIR="/root/data"
DATE="mysql-`date +'%Y%m%d-%H:%M:%S'`"
LogFile="$BACK_DIR"/dbbakup.log
BackNewFile=$DATE.sql

$BIN_DIR/mysqldump -u$DB_USER -p$DB_PASSWORD $DB_NAME > $BACK_DIR/$DATE.sql

echo -----------------"$(date +"%y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")"------------------ >> $LogFile

echo  createFile:"$BackNewFile" >> $LogFile

find "/root/data/" -ctime +0 -type f -name "*.sql" -print > deleted.txt

echo -e "delete files:\n" >> $LogFile

cat deleted.txt | while read LINE
do
    rm -rf $LINE
    echo $LINE>> $LogFile
done

echo "---------------------------------------------------------------" >> $LogFile
```

Post.title: mysqlsequence
Post._content:
# sequence

Oracle(SEQUENCE)()

# mysqlsequence

## sequence

```
    CREATE TABLE sequence (
            name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
            current_value INT NOT NULL,
            increment INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
            PRIMARY KEY (name)
            )
```

## 

```
CREATE FUNCTION currval (seq_name VARCHAR(50))
    RETURNS INTEGER
    LANGUAGE SQL
    DETERMINISTIC
    CONTAINS SQL
    SQL SECURITY DEFINER
    COMMENT ''
    BEGIN
    DECLARE value INTEGER;

@EnableEurekaServerSpring Boot
```

        new SpringApplicationBuilder(Application.class).web(true).run(args);
    }
}
